name: AVANTHI MAHILA MANDALI
briefDescription: AVANTHI MAHILA MANDALI has been registered to work on women development issues in the month of February 2010.  AVANTHI MAHILA MANDALI out of its own interest, trying to integrate Rural Development aspects into all its programmes. It is planning trainings for the women & children with the support of local support. Keeping this background in mind AMM has decided to continue its work on the similar lines in the next five years.  The strategy is to intensify the work at the project (local) level and minimize the work at the district level.
